11#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/transparent_mode.h"
12
13#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
14#include "system_wrappers/include/field_trial.h"
15
16namespace webrtc {
17namespace {
18
19constexpr size_t kBlocksSinceConvergencedFilterInit = 10000;
20constexpr size_t kBlocksSinceConsistentEstimateInit = 10000;
21
22bool DeactivateTransparentMode() {
23 return field_trial::IsEnabled("WebRTC-Aec3TransparentModeKillSwitch");
24}
25
26bool ActivateTransparentModeHmm() {
27 return field_trial::IsEnabled("WebRTC-Aec3TransparentModeHmm");
28}
29
30} // namespace
31
32// Classifier that toggles transparent mode which reduces echo suppression when
33// headsets are used.
34class TransparentModeImpl : public TransparentMode {
35 public:
36 bool Active() const override { return transparency_activated_; }
37
38 void Reset() override {
39 // Determines if transparent mode is used.
40 transparency_activated_ = false;
41
42 // The estimated probability of being transparent mode.
43 prob_transparent_state_ = 0.f;
44 }
45
46 void Update(int filter_delay_blocks,
47 bool any_filter_consistent,
48 bool any_filter_converged,
49 bool any_coarse_filter_converged,
50 bool all_filters_diverged,
51 bool active_render,
52 bool saturated_capture) override {
53 // The classifier is implemented as a Hidden Markov Model (HMM) with two
54 // hidden states: "normal" and "transparent". The estimated probabilities of
55 // the two states are updated by observing filter convergence during active
56 // render. The filters are less likely to be reported as converged when
57 // there is no echo present in the microphone signal.
58
59 // The constants have been obtained by observing active_render and
60 // any_coarse_filter_converged under varying call scenarios. They
61 // have further been hand tuned to prefer normal state during uncertain
62 // regions (to avoid echo leaks).
63
64 // The model is only updated during active render.
65 if (!active_render)
66 return;
67
68 // Probability of switching from one state to the other.
69 constexpr float kSwitch = 0.000001f;
70
71 // Probability of observing converged filters in states "normal" and
72 // "transparent" during active render.
73 constexpr float kConvergedNormal = 0.01f;
74 constexpr float kConvergedTransparent = 0.001f;
75
76 // Probability of transitioning to transparent state from normal state and
77 // transparent state respectively.
78 constexpr float kA[2] = {kSwitch, 1.f - kSwitch};
79
80 // Probability of the two observations (converged filter or not converged
81 // filter) in normal state and transparent state respectively.
82 constexpr float kB[2][2] = {
83 {1.f - kConvergedNormal, kConvergedNormal},
84 {1.f - kConvergedTransparent, kConvergedTransparent}};
85
86 // Probability of the two states before the update.
87 const float prob_transparent = prob_transparent_state_;
88 const float prob_normal = 1.f - prob_transparent;
89
90 // Probability of transitioning to transparent state.
91 const float prob_transition_transparent =
92 prob_normal * kA[0] + prob_transparent * kA[1];
93 const float prob_transition_normal = 1.f - prob_transition_transparent;
94
95 // Observed output.
96 const int out = static_cast<int>(any_coarse_filter_converged);
97
98 // Joint probabilites of the observed output and respective states.
99 const float prob_joint_normal = prob_transition_normal * kB[0][out];
100 const float prob_joint_transparent =
101 prob_transition_transparent * kB[1][out];
102
103 // Conditional probability of transparent state and the observed output.
104 RTC_DCHECK_GT(prob_joint_normal + prob_joint_transparent, 0.f);
105 prob_transparent_state_ =
106 prob_joint_transparent / (prob_joint_normal + prob_joint_transparent);
107
108 // Transparent mode is only activated when its state probability is high.
109 // Dead zone between activation/deactivation thresholds to avoid switching
110 // back and forth.
111 if (prob_transparent_state_ > 0.95f) {
112 transparency_activated_ = true;
113 } else if (prob_transparent_state_ < 0.5f) {
114 transparency_activated_ = false;
115 }
116 }
117
118 private:
119 bool transparency_activated_ = false;
120 float prob_transparent_state_ = 0.f;
121};
122
123// Legacy classifier for toggling transparent mode.
124class LegacyTransparentModeImpl : public TransparentMode {
125 public:
126 explicit LegacyTransparentModeImpl(const EchoCanceller3Config& config)
127 : linear_and_stable_echo_path_(
128 config.echo_removal_control.linear_and_stable_echo_path),
129 active_blocks_since_sane_filter_(kBlocksSinceConsistentEstimateInit),
130 non_converged_sequence_size_(kBlocksSinceConvergencedFilterInit) {}
131
132 bool Active() const override { return transparency_activated_; }
133
134 void Reset() override {
135 non_converged_sequence_size_ = kBlocksSinceConvergencedFilterInit;
136 diverged_sequence_size_ = 0;
137 strong_not_saturated_render_blocks_ = 0;
138 if (linear_and_stable_echo_path_) {
139 recent_convergence_during_activity_ = false;
140 }
141 }
142
143 void Update(int filter_delay_blocks,
144 bool any_filter_consistent,
145 bool any_filter_converged,
146 bool any_coarse_filter_converged,
147 bool all_filters_diverged,
148 bool active_render,
149 bool saturated_capture) override {
150 ++capture_block_counter_;
151 strong_not_saturated_render_blocks_ +=
152 active_render && !saturated_capture ? 1 : 0;
153
154 if (any_filter_consistent && filter_delay_blocks < 5) {
155 sane_filter_observed_ = true;
156 active_blocks_since_sane_filter_ = 0;
157 } else if (active_render) {
158 ++active_blocks_since_sane_filter_;
159 }
160
161 bool sane_filter_recently_seen;
162 if (!sane_filter_observed_) {
163 sane_filter_recently_seen =
164 capture_block_counter_ <= 5 * kNumBlocksPerSecond;
165 } else {
166 sane_filter_recently_seen =
167 active_blocks_since_sane_filter_ <= 30 * kNumBlocksPerSecond;
168 }
169
170 if (any_filter_converged) {
171 recent_convergence_during_activity_ = true;
172 active_non_converged_sequence_size_ = 0;
173 non_converged_sequence_size_ = 0;
174 ++num_converged_blocks_;
175 } else {
176 if (++non_converged_sequence_size_ > 20 * kNumBlocksPerSecond) {
177 num_converged_blocks_ = 0;
178 }
179
180 if (active_render &&
181 ++active_non_converged_sequence_size_ > 60 * kNumBlocksPerSecond) {
182 recent_convergence_during_activity_ = false;
183 }
184 }
185
186 if (!all_filters_diverged) {
187 diverged_sequence_size_ = 0;
188 } else if (++diverged_sequence_size_ >= 60) {
189 // TODO(peah): Change these lines to ensure proper triggering of usable
190 // filter.
191 non_converged_sequence_size_ = kBlocksSinceConvergencedFilterInit;
192 }
193
194 if (active_non_converged_sequence_size_ > 60 * kNumBlocksPerSecond) {
195 finite_erl_recently_detected_ = false;
196 }
197 if (num_converged_blocks_ > 50) {
198 finite_erl_recently_detected_ = true;
199 }
200
201 if (finite_erl_recently_detected_) {
202 transparency_activated_ = false;
203 } else if (sane_filter_recently_seen &&
204 recent_convergence_during_activity_) {
205 transparency_activated_ = false;
206 } else {
207 const bool filter_should_have_converged =
208 strong_not_saturated_render_blocks_ > 6 * kNumBlocksPerSecond;
209 transparency_activated_ = filter_should_have_converged;
210 }
211 }
212
213 private:
214 const bool linear_and_stable_echo_path_;
215 size_t capture_block_counter_ = 0;
216 bool transparency_activated_ = false;
217 size_t active_blocks_since_sane_filter_;
218 bool sane_filter_observed_ = false;
219 bool finite_erl_recently_detected_ = false;
220 size_t non_converged_sequence_size_;
221 size_t diverged_sequence_size_ = 0;
222 size_t active_non_converged_sequence_size_ = 0;
223 size_t num_converged_blocks_ = 0;
224 bool recent_convergence_during_activity_ = false;
225 size_t strong_not_saturated_render_blocks_ = 0;
226};
227
228std::unique_ptr<TransparentMode> TransparentMode::Create(
229 const EchoCanceller3Config& config) {
230 if (config.ep_strength.bounded_erl || DeactivateTransparentMode()) {
231 return nullptr;
232 }
233 if (ActivateTransparentModeHmm()) {
234 return std::make_unique<TransparentModeImpl>();
235 }
236 return std::make_unique<LegacyTransparentModeImpl>(config);
237}
238
239} // namespace webrtc
